rule.description: Windows: Failed attempt to perform a privileged operation
Windows: User account '$(WinEvtChannel.EventData.TargetUserName)' enabled or created by '$(WinEvtChannel.EventData.SubjectUserName)'.
Windows: User account $(WinEvtChannel.EventData.TargetUserName) disabled or deleted.
Windows: User account $(WinEvtChannel.System.SubjectUserName) locked out (multiple login errors).
Windows: First time this user logged in this system.
Windows: Logon Failure - UNKNOWN user $(WinEvtChannel.EventData.User) or bad password.
Windows: Logon Failure - Account logon time restriction violation. $(WinEvtChannel.EventData.TargetUserName)
Windows: Logon Failure - Account currently disabled. $(WinEvtChannel.EventData.TargetUserName)
Windows: Logon Failure - Specified account expired. $(WinEvtChannel.EventData.TargetUserName)
Windows: Logon Failure - User $(WinEvtChannel.EventData.TargetUserName) not allowed to login at this computer.
Windows: Logon Failure - User $(WinEvtChannel.EventData.TargetUserName) not granted logon type.
Windows: Logon Failure - Account's password expired. $(WinEvtChannel.EventData.TargetUserName)
Windows: Logon Failure - Account locked out. $(WinEvtChannel.EventData.TargetUserName)
Windows: Service startup type was changed.
rule.info: This does not appear to be logged on Windows 2000.

rule.description: Ignore rule 200157: TS Gateway login success
Windows DC integrity check on decrypted
Windows DC - Clock skew too great.
Windows: Multiple failed attempts to perform a privileged operation by the same user: $(WinEvtChannel.EventData.SubjectUserName)
Windows: Multiple remote access login failures: $(WinEvtChannel.EventData.TargetUserName)
Windows: Multiple TS Gateway login failures.
Chrome Remote Desktop attempt - access denied $(WinEvtChannel.EventData.Data)
Chrome Remote Desktop attempt - Client connected $(WinEvtChannel.EventData.Data)
